title: "Your Shop" got me worried
body: The recent "Your Shop" thing gave me a discount of 50% off Underworld TF. I really want this skin so I went out to buy RP, when I came back they disabled the shop and I have 500RP waiting for my Underworld TF. Are they going to refresh the offers or keep them because I really want that skin.

replies.body: I answered your earlier comment, but you can absolutely get that skin still. We have records of what was offered at first, so simply hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we should be able to make that work for ya!
I'm unsure if the skins in Your Shop will stay the same after they return. You could send a ticket to [Riot Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) and ask if your skins will reset.
Yeah, i would like to know as well , i got championship thresh for 500 rp and i bought rp only cuz of it
